msg:
系统异常
### Error querying database.  Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column 'sort' in 'order clause'
### The error may exist in com/coderman/api/biz/mapper/ConsumerMapper.java (best guess)
### The error may involve com.coderman.api.biz.mapper.ConsumerMapper.selectByExample-Inline
### The error occurred while setting parameters
### SQL: SELECT  id,name,address,create_time,modified_time,phone  FROM biz_consumer   order by sort asc LIMIT ?
### Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column 'sort' in 'order clause'
; bad SQL grammar []; nested exception is java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column 'sort' in 'order clause'
